title: Icebergs, Twillingate, Newfoundland
provenance: Louis P. Church, Hudson, New York
medium: Brush and oil paint, graphite on paperboard
description: One large iceberg at top, two separate studies below at right and left. Water indicated as dark blue; the icebergs are outlined against brushed gray over an orange ground color. The unpainted edge is visible across lower edge.
name: Drawing
